verbose_text: T follicular helper (Tfh) cells in the Peyer 's patches (PPs) of the small intestine promote germinal center (GC) reactions and affinity maturation of IgA responses that are critical for efficient mucosal defense by limiting the translocation of potentially invasive bacteria and microbial inflammatory compounds from the gut lumen into the organism.
evidence: PPs) of the small intestine promote germinal center (GC) reactions and affinity maturation of IgA
